function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential risk of undetected sars-cov-2 in wastewater due to limitations in concentration and detection methods.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of optimization for the entire protocol from sampling to detection/quantification may lead to inaccurate results and inefficient virus analysis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant issues identified for the virus quantitative analysis in wastewater and sludge matrices, indicating potential challenges in accurate virus detection and quantification in these complex environments.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of advanced rna detection methods like crispr and dpcr for virus detection and quantification presents the risk of misinterpretation or inadequate understanding of the results compared to traditional methods like rt-qpcr.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex microfluidic systems with interconnected networks may be prone to contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low-cost mass production of loc-based devices may lead to compromised quality control and increased risk of device malfunction.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Widespread use of loc-based techniques for viral detection may create false positives or false negatives in diagnostic results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of lab-in-a-tube, lab-in-a-box, and lab on-a-drone systems for disease diagnosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid development and deployment of poct systems for pandemic diagnosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global emphasis on the need for rapid and sensitive detection techniques like biosensors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of influenza a h1n1 and human adenovirus","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of biosensor terminology among environmental audience","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High lods for lassa fever, west nile fever, and influenza could lead to missed detection of the viruses in wastewater, increasing the risk of environmental contamination.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of a paper-based device to detect sars-cov-2 in wastewaters increases the risk of undetected viral presence in the environment and potential transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex matrix in wastewaters may interfere with biosensor detection, leading to inaccurate results and potential misinterpretation of viral presence.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Endogenous biomarkers present in sewage systems can be used to estimate the real-time population served by the system, posing a risk of privacy invasion.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The identification and monitoring of disease biomarkers in sewage systems could lead to the unintentional disclosure of health information of entire populations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proteomic identification of disease biomarkers in sewage systems may lead to the unintentional tracking and monitoring of health conditions of different populations, potentially violating privacy and ethical standards.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on pcr for detection of sars-cov-2 in wastewater","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized evaluation and verification of rt-qpcr methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity of wastewater matrix impacting detection methods","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies between laboratories due to factors such as qpcr platforms, pcr inhibitors, nucleic acid extraction efficiency, and low levels of targets","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large uncertainty in viral load in feces making it difficult to determine a typical value for wbe and comparison with clinical data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization in laboratory protocols for detecting sars-cov-2 and determining viral content","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of clinical technology to wbe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small market size for environmental biosensors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of optimization in wastewater treatment technology for virus transmission control","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of pcr technologies and endogenous biomarker measurements may lead to inaccurate identification of specific diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of specific diseases due to biomarkers not being specific to a given disease, leading to misdiagnosis and ineffective containment measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of asymptomatic cases and immunized patients through wbe may lead to complacency and reduced adherence to preventive measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of microfluidic cartridges and pcr-based systems for rapid testing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Approval and widespread use of various poct systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Application of technology without professional skills","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global environmental changes such as climate change and ecosystem shifts altering the thresholds of the planet","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the complex ways in which global changes affect human, animal, and natural systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continued high incidence and distribution of vectorborne diseases vbds","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases and zoonotic diseases are implicated, disproportionately impacting people in tropical climates with inadequate access to health services, poor housing, weak governance structures, and socio-economic underdevelopment.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of progress in tackling vector-borne diseases vbds across the world and across all diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emerging vector-borne diseases, such as zika virus zikv and chikungunya chik , have infected millions and are linked to neurological and developmental disorders in infants.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-emphasis on technology and biomedical expertise","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underdeveloped thematic areas for vbds: community participation, citizen engagement, social differentiation, and wider system dynamics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for vulnerability, resilience, adaption, and community-based approaches","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased vector densities and geographical spread due to climate change","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding the impacts of global change on vector-borne diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate community-based approaches for vector-borne disease strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wide variation in level of detail provided in adaptation plans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of attention to education and community participation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to specify responsible agencies and mechanisms for collaboration and funding","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases transmitted by multiple species of vectors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
